headline: Ask HN: What's Your Experience with Darklang?
description: I just saw that Darklang 3.0 just got released (https://blog.darklang.com/darklang-release-3) a few days ago. I found it very intriguing from the day they first announced it, but somehow never got around actually building something on it. What's everyone's experiences with it so far?
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 你对Darklang有什么经验？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 你對Darklang有什麼經驗？
description_zh-Hans: 我刚刚看到Darklang 3.0几天前刚刚发布（https://blog.darklang.com/darklang-release-3）。从他们第一次公布的那天起，我就发现它非常吸引人，但不知为什么，我从来没有在它上面实际建立过什么。到目前为止，大家对它有什么经验？
description_zh-Hant: 我剛剛看到Darklang 3.0幾天前剛剛發佈（https://blog.darklang.com/darklang-release-3）。從他們第一次公佈的那天起，我就發現它非常吸引人，但不知為什麼，我從來沒有在它上面實際建立過什麼。到目前為止，大家對它有什麼經驗？
